code: import React from'react';import{Button,Card,Image}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UpsellItems=()=>{const upsellItems=[{name:'The Duo',price:20,original:24,image:'https://via.placeholder.com/60'},{name:'The Travel Kit',price:40,original:52,image:'https://via.placeholder.com/60'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:upsellItems.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{className:"d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"d-flex align-items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Image,{src:item.image,width:60,className:"me-3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:["$",item.price.toFixed(2)]}),' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("del",{className:"text-muted",children:["$",item.original.toFixed(2)]})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-dark",size:"sm",children:"Add"})]})},idx))});};export default UpsellItems;
